fullplot: Ed convinces his best friend Paul that he should fool around with other women in order to preserve his happy marriage. Ed illustrates his point with a series of vignettes acted out by a lot of famous celebrities. The joke of it all is that Paul is married to lovely Ruth!
plot: A man gives his co-worker a series of lessons on how to cheat on one's wife without being caught.
title: A Guide for the Married Man
